Class IssuesListController

java.lang.Object
controller.IssuesListController
public class IssuesListController extends Object
Controller responsible for displaying the list of all issues in the application. This class initializes and manages the Issues List view, including configuring list cell rendering, handling user interaction (mouse double-click and keyboard shortcuts), and delegating navigation to the main application window controller.
Version:
0.2
Author:
Artur Twardzik

    Callback used to report exceptions or errors back to the parent controller.

    Reference to the main window controller used for navigation and shared data access.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    initializeData()
    Initializes the issues list view by configuring its cell factory, setting up mouse and keyboard shortcuts for opening issue details, loading issue data from the parent controller, and establishing focus behavior when the scene becomes active.
    void
    refreshIssues()
    Refreshes the ListView of filtered issues.
    void
    setExceptionListerner(ChildControllerListener eventListerner)
    Registers an exception listener to receive error notifications triggered by interactions inside the issues list view.
    void
    setParent(MainAppWindowController mainWindowController)
    Sets the parent MainAppWindowController responsible for providing issue data and handling navigation actions.

      The ListView displaying all issues in the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • IssuesListController

      public IssuesListController()

  • Method Details

    • initializeData

      public void initializeData()
      Initializes the issues list view by configuring its cell factory, setting up mouse and keyboard shortcuts for opening issue details, loading issue data from the parent controller, and establishing focus behavior when the scene becomes active.

    • setParent

      public void setParent(MainAppWindowController mainWindowController)
      Sets the parent MainAppWindowController responsible for providing issue data and handling navigation actions.
      Parameters:
      mainWindowController - the parent controller

    • setExceptionListerner

      public void setExceptionListerner(ChildControllerListener eventListerner)
      Registers an exception listener to receive error notifications triggered by interactions inside the issues list view.
      Parameters:
      eventListerner - the listener to notify on exceptions

    • refreshIssues

      public void refreshIssues()
      Refreshes the ListView of filtered issues. Useful when external changes occur that modify the displayed issues (e.g., issue edited elsewhere).
